___name.description: The full gene name preferably approved by the official nomenclature.
___name.title: Name

___geneid.description: NCBI Entrez GeneID of official nomenclature approved gene.
___geneid.comment: An ENCODE gene (object) needs to have an Entrez GeneID and needs to be approved by (i.e. have an ID and gene symbol from) offical nomenclature such as HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase.
___geneid.title: NCBI Entrez GeneID

___synonyms.description: Alternative symbols that have been used to refer to the gene.
___synonyms.comment: The list of synonyms is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Synonyms not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.
___synonyms.title: Synonyms

items.description: An alternative symbol/name referring to the gene.
items.title: Synonym

___symbol.description: Gene symbol approved by the official nomenclature.
___symbol.title: Gene symbol

___dbxrefs.comment: This list should have at least an ID from the official nomenclature. The list of other dbxrefs is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Identifiers not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.
___dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase, ENSEMBL, MIM, UniProtKB, Vega, miRBase).
items.comment: Submit as database_name:id. See changelog for potential databases.
items.title: External identifier

___locations.description: Gene locations specified using 1-based, closed coordinates for different versions of reference genome assemblies.
___locations.title: Gene locations

items.description: Gene location specified using 1-based, closed coordinates for a specific version of the reference genome assembly.
items.title: Gene location

___assembly.description: The genome assembly to which coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38.
___assembly.title: Mapping assembly

___chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX
___chromosome.title: Chromosome
